irobots.behaviour

Class ExitProgramBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • irobots.behaviour.ExitProgramBehavior
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    lejos.robotics.subsumption.Behavior

    public class ExitProgramBehavior
extends java.lang.Object
implements lejos.robotics.subsumption.Behavior
    The ExitProgramBehavior exits the program when the escape button is pressed. This Behavior can be used as the highest priority behavior in order to allow exiting the program at any time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExitProgramBehavior() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void action()
      On activation the behavior causes the running program to exit.
      void suppress()
      Suppression is not possible
      boolean takeControl()
      Takes control whenever the Escape button is pressed.
